data.title: Arizona Christian University Admissions
meta_keywords: get in to Arizona Christian University
data.meta_description: Will you get in? View Arizona Christian University admissions statistics, acceptance rate, SAT/ACT scores, and admissions requirements.
data.text: Arizona Christian admissions is somewhat selective with an acceptance rate of 70%. Students that get into Arizona Christian have an average SAT score between 960-1170 or an average ACT score of 16-23. The regular admissions application deadline for Arizona Christian is rolling.
